content: And while she's no longer with us, I know my grandmother's watching, along with the family that made me who I am. I miss them tonight. I know that my debt to them is beyond measure. To my sister Maya, my sister Alma, all my other brothers and sisters, thank you so much for all the support that you've given me. I'm grateful to them.
translations: ita:E mentre lei non è più con noi, so che mia nonna sta osservando, insieme alla famiglia che mi ha reso quello che sono. M
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by unknown (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
